Liste.Name: Altmer (High Elf)
Liste.Power_description: Regenerate 25% of the character's maximum magicka per second for 60 seconds.

Liste.Name: Argonian
Liste.Power_description: Regenerate health 10 times faster for 60 seconds.

Liste.Name: Bosmer (Wood Elf)
Liste.Power_description: Make all surrounding animals your allies for 60 seconds.

Liste.Name: Breton
Liste.Power_description: Absorb 50% of magicka from all incoming spells for 60 seconds.

Liste.Name: Dunmer (Dark Elf)
Liste.Power_description: Surrounds the character in fire for 60 seconds.

Liste.Name: Imperial
Liste.Power_description: Nearby people are Calmed for 30 seconds.

Liste.Name: Khajiit
Liste.Power_description: Improved Night Vision for 60 seconds (can be toggled multiple times per day).

Liste.Name: Nord
Liste.Power_description: Nearby enemies are Frightened for 30 seconds.

Liste.Name: Orsimer (Orc)
Liste.Power_description: Take half damage and do double physical damage for 60 seconds.
Liste.Racial_Effect: Are allowed to enter Orc mining camps and strongholds without first becoming Blood-kin.

Liste.Name: Redguard
Liste.Power_description: Regenerate stamina 10 times faster for 60 seconds.
